artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Mitan; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: From fashion periodical (P.15,234.1); a man in yellow breeches, a green, pink, and white checkered vest, a black coat with coral-colored trim, and a black hat
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate III from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Trente-troisième Cahier, 10 Octobre 1787
